Here’s a quick summary of the eligibility criteria for the **EU Horizon Europe – Large Research Infrastructure (ERI) grant**:

- **Who can apply?**
  - Research organisations, universities, public‑private partnerships, and NGOs.
  - Must be based in an EU Member State or an associated country.
- **Consortium requirements:**
  - Minimum of **three independent entities**.
  - At least **one participant must be from an EU Member State**.
- **Strategic fit:**
  - The project must target **one or more Horizon Europe strategic priorities**.
  - Must demonstrate **European added value** (i.e., benefits that go beyond national capabilities).
- **Other conditions:**
  - Applicants should be able to manage a budget of up to **€500 million**.
  - The full proposal must be submitted by **15 March 2025**.

You can find the full call text and apply via the official page: https://ec.europa.eu/info/horizon-europe/eri-apply
